title: Impact of industrial agriculture on the US

content.description:
Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline each answer. While a formal essay is not required, it is not enough to answer a question by merely listing facts. Illustrate your answers with substantive geographic examples where appropriate.

The rise of industrial agriculture has had significant effects on the environment and the economy of the United States.
content.question:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

A. Define “industrial agriculture.” 

B. Identify and describe ONE benefit of industrial agriculture.

C. Discuss TWO environmental impacts associated with industrial agriculture.

frqParts.text:
Respond to parts A, B, and C.

A. Define “industrial agriculture.” 

B. Identify and describe ONE benefit of industrial agriculture.

C. Discuss TWO environmental impacts associated with industrial agriculture.

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
